spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Andram is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following paladin spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Andram's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). Andram can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Turn the Unholy (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Andram prays, censuring fiends and undead. Each fiend or undead within 30 feet of Andram must succeed a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute or until it takes damage.
{@bold {@italic Purpose.}} Give quests and provide assistance to the players.
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} I am charitable and just, even though I have to fight my nature for it. (Virtue)
